original_text: And some of the chief of the fathers gave to the treasure of the work twenty thousand drams of gold, and two thousand and two hundred pound of silver.
korean_text: 또 어떤 족장들은 금 이만 드라크마와 은 이천이백 마네를 역사 곳간에 드렸고

sentences.original_text: And some of the chief of the fathers gave
to the treasure of the work
and two thousand and two hundred pound of silver
